Number

class ase2sprkkr.potentials.test.grammar_types.basic.Number(prefix=None, postfix=None, format='', after_format=None, default_value=None, condition=None, after_convert=None, description='', min=None, max=None)[source]

Base class for a number - descendants of this class can have minimal and/or maximal possible value.
